name: It Lab
description:
It Lab is a digital circuit simulator for electrictiy laboratory courses in the universities.

All saved circuits in the video provided in the download link with SavedGames folder.

Hint: If you want to use SavedGames folder provided in download link

  1. Run the game once then close (This allows unreal engine to create local folders in the computer. So, if you already opened the game before, you don't need to do this step. )
  2. Go to C:\Users\[Your Username]\AppData\Local\IT_LAB\Saved and paste SavedGames folder.
